name: Car Transporter 3D - Vehicle Police Duty Driving Truck Simulator Game
name_original: Car Transporter 3D - Vehicle Police Duty Driving Truck Simulator Game
description:
Car Transporter- Transport Cars and Unlock more trucks in this FREE car Transporting game!
Car Transporter is a free transporter game where you load and transport various new cars. Play and be the ultimate transporter. Drive carefully on the tracks in this free car adventure. Sports, racer, SUV, trucks and many other types of cars can be unlocked and transported. Cars Transporter includes realistic physics and challenging uphill levels to transport. Use the simple car controls to drag the cars on to your vehicle, then drive it upto the car garage. Upgrade your trucks to transport more number of cars and to drive uphill roads easily only in Car Transporter. Be the car transport king with one of the most loved Car Transporter game on the Play Store!

Game Features:

*FREE Car Transporter game
*Variety of Cars to Transport
*AMAZING Car graphics
*UPGRADE your heavy transport trucks for better cars transport.


How to Play:

Drag the motors in to the Transport Truck and transport the cars.
Tap to Race and Tilt to control balance.
